course_name: Study of Society: Specialist Teaching Area
description:
This course is designed to challenge preservice teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. The discipline base of Study of Society derives from the multiple perspectives provided by sociology, anthropology, social psychology and the sociology of politics and the law. Preservice teachers completing this course will be prepared to teach the Study of Society curriculum area offered in some schools.

This course may not be offered if the enrolment is less than 10 students.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
